cue.label: Introduction
cue.voice: Don't context switch between repositories. Kanbus allows you to mount other projects into your current workspace.

cue.label: Unified Workflow
cue.voice: Aggregate issues from all configured projects into a single list. Query, filter, and track work across your entire stack.

cue.label: Shared Config
cue.voice: Add virtual projects to your team's configuration file, and everyone gets the same unified view automatically.

cue.label: Local Overrides
cue.voice: Need to track a dependency just for yourself? Use a private, git-ignored configuration to customize your personal workflow.
